00042 std::string TMixed::get_name() const
00043 {
00044   std::ostringstream name;
00045   name << "2D:" << mu2D->get_name() << "; "
00046        << "3D:" << mu3D->get_name();
00047   return name.str();
00048 }

00052 bool TMixed::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00053                        double& result, 
00054                        MsqError& err )
00055 {
00056   bool rval = mu2D->evaluate( T, result, err );
00057   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00058   return rval;
00059 }
